title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Dip chicken breasts in beaten eggs, then coat with a mixture of bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese.
Place in a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes.
Top each piece with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Return to oven and bake for an additional 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve with pasta or a side salad.
